issue.title: [R] [CI] AppVeyor build should use ccache
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5724](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5724). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It looks like ccache is not installed for the R AppVeyor build. `[~npr]` `[~kou]`

comments.body:
